review_title: 5.0 out of 5 stars My kid loved them
review_body: I actually bought these for my 2 year old girl. We had a very cheap toy car and she loved that she could wind it let it go. When it broke I decided to get these. They keep her entertained for a while. The packaging also had hello kitty and peppa pig stickers. Not are why but I have girls so it worked out lol.
My 2 year old grandson LOVED them. Pretty well built for the money
My wife ordered these for a little game with the grandkids. They worked well, and are fun to play with. Even for the grown ups.

review_title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Plastic body on cars
review_body: The cars were inexpensive, the car bodies are plastic but my three year old grandson is happy enough. At least they are lightweight enough when in the carry case.

review_title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Not very sturdy
review_body: The cars weren't as sturdy as I would like. My grandchildren had fun playing with them, but they will not last very long.
The cars race well. They are colorful and appear to be well made. My grandson loved them. Good value for a gift!
My 4 year old got these for Chris. They are really cheap and made out of plastic. Was not expecting them to be plastic. My so still loved them though and played with them. Not made to last!
Bought some of these for the grand children for Christmas they Love them thanks Amazon.
